nodes.bodyText: Higher priorities will be invoked first? It would be nice to make that explicit too
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -150,6 +140,12 @@ public class RolesAugmentor implements SecurityIdentityAugmentor {
 }
 ----
 
+[NOTE]
+===
+If more than one custom `SecurityIdentityAugmentor` is registered then they will be considered equal candidates and called in random order.
+You can enforce the call order by implementing a default `SecurityIdentityAugmentor#priority` method.

@@ -150,6 +140,12 @@ public class RolesAugmentor implements SecurityIdentityAugmentor {
 }
 ----
 
+[NOTE]
+===
+If more than one custom `SecurityIdentityAugmentor` is registered then they will be considered equal candidates and called in random order.
+You can enforce the call order by implementing a default `SecurityIdentityAugmentor#priority` method.
